description:
Even on the morning of the graduation ceremony, the members gather in their club room. At Shion-san`s request, Kyoya follows her out to the vending machines... Once he returns to the club room, he receives a text while alone with Kirara...
Finally, after school, the club`s last activity together begins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let Us Say Good Bye, GJ Club
